Articles.Content:
I, along with lots more in Canada, am having issues with shaw. It seems to be in the general alberta region according to canadian outages

http://canadianoutages.com/status/shaw

My phones all acting up, cutting off after a 49 seconds, and all gargly. The internet has been slow, not at all, and sometimes OK.

Just wondering if anyone else is having problems with shaw Internet/phone.

-TD

Ah, I see the problem now. This happened to me twice now. Sometimes, Shaw just decides that you don't need internet for a month, or two. Then it goes back to normal. Happens a lot, frankly. But Shaw is better with its Gigabit internet it's spreading across Alberta through Edmonton.
Well, It's definitley better now....
We had some problems where Windows Diagnostics decided the DNS server was down, but it's been fine lately (knocks on wood). Not as good as TheDestroyer's tho

We had some problems where Windows Diagnostics decided the DNS server was down, but it's been fine lately (knocks on wood). Not as good as TheDestroyer's tho

http://www.speedtest.net/result/3557877055.png

That's what it gave me too when it went down. Then it just went REALLY slowly but it would load... if you waited half an hour.
